1.5. Report Bugs¶

1.5.1. Contact¶

The best way to report bugs to ITTIA is through the Support Portal.

When a program produces an error message, it is important to include the message in your issue report. When you find a security bug, please inform us immediately.

1.5.2. Describe Development Environment and the Problem¶

With your report, please provide the exact product name and version number, hardware manufacturer and model of the embedded system, operating system name and version, and specific information about your issue, such as schema and queries. If you are using a beta version of the product, please mention it with your report.

Please describe the expected result and what explain happened instead.

1.5.3. Reproduce the Problem¶

ITTIA technical support team will reproduce the reported issue and, if the product behavior is wrong, direct the issue to engineering to assign priority for a fix. If the product is behaving as designed, the support team will direct you to take the correct steps.
